education_text.0: Mario Szegedy (born October 23, 1960) is a American      Computer scientist computer scientist,      professor of      Computer science computer science at      Rutgers University Rutgers UniversityMario Szegedy (born October 23, 1960) is a American      Computer scientist computer scientist,      professor of      Computer science computer science at      Rutgers University Rutgers UniversitySzegedy's research areas include      Computational complexity theory computational complexity theory,      Quantum computing quantum computing,      Computational geometry computational geometry, and      redirect    Computational theory computational theory
